definitions.definition: ( countable ) The pungent , spicy fresh or dried fruit of any of several cultivated varieties of capsicum peppers , used in cooking.
( uncountable ) Powdered chili pepper , used as a spice or flavouring in cooking .
( Indian Chinese cuisine ) A spicy stew of chicken or paneer , capsicum and onion , eaten as an appetizer.

main_definition: ( countable ) The pungent , spicy fresh or dried fruit of any of several cultivated varieties of capsicum peppers , used in cooking.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Powdered chili pepper , used as a spice or flavouring in cooking .
( Indian Chinese cuisine ) A spicy stew of chicken or paneer , capsicum and onion , eaten as an appetizer.

definitions.definition: A dish made with chili peppers and other ingredients, such as beans and beef.

main_definition: ( chiefly US ) A dish made with chili peppers and other ingredients, such as beans and beef.
